result.title: District Cooling open-source library (DCOL)
result.description: This deliverable is an open-source library that contains all the detailed models developed for typical components present in DC systems (parametric thermo-fluid dynamic models, carried out in Modelica language). They will be classified into generation, distribution, storage, or HVAC components.
